directions: Combine vegetable broth, cabbage, celery, onions, and mushrooms in a large stockpot. Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 20 minutes.
Place 1/4 cup bean sprouts into 4 serving bowls. Divide green onions and jalapenos among the bowls. Ladle soup into each bowl and add Sriracha sauce. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 dash Sriracha sauce, or to taste
title: Skinny Soup
